pages.text: Welcome to Amethyst Imbuement. Ready to start on a magical journey? Start with these simple steps to begin down your path!$(br2)The heart of AI is the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(), lets start by gathering up ingredients to make and fuel one!

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_mat.text: $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst)Amethyst Shards$() are the entrypoint to Amethyst Imbuement, find yourself a geode! $(item)Crying Obsidian$() is an important ingredient in the powerful AI altars.

amethyst_imbuement:flower_power.text: Most base crystals need flowers, especially the 4 double-high flowers ($(item)Sunflower$(), $(item)Peony$(), $(item)Rose Bush$(), $(item)Lilac$()). Find in various fields and forests.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/imbuing_t.text: Craft your $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$(), opening the door to most of the rest of the mod!

amethyst_imbuement:pillars.text: The imbuing table is powered by experience. Imbue some $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/xp_bush_seed)Experience Bushes$() to secure a steady flow of the stuff. Augment your supply by enchanting gear with $(l:amethyst_imbuement:enchantments/new_weapon_enchants#insight)Insight$().
Finish your upgrading journey! Craft a powerful tier 3 scepter.
